name: HostedUIResources
tagline: Bazaarvoice Hosted UI Implementation Resources binaries
body:
## Bazaarvoice Hosted UI Resources binaries

This page contains binaries for code in the [HostedUIResources](https://github.com/bazaarvoice/HostedUIResources) project.  Please see the project for documentation and additional details.

***

### Java SEO SDK Binaries
#### See the [Java SDK](https://github.com/bazaarvoice/HostedUIResources/tree/master/SEOIntegration/examples/java) GitHub project for documentation.

***
Release 1.1.1 - 31 July 2013
* 1.1.1 standalone JAR - [bvseosdk-1.1.1.jar](http://bazaarvoice.github.io/HostedUIResources/binaries/seosdk/java/1.1.1/bvseosdk-1.1.1.jar)
* 1.1.1 JAR with dependencies - [bvseosdk-1.1.1-jar-with-dependencies.jar](http://bazaarvoice.github.io/HostedUIResources/binaries/seosdk/java/1.1.1/bvseosdk-1.1.1-jar-with-dependencies.jar)
* **release notes**
 * Related to the 1.1 configuration changes, additional default properties are now included in the JAR so clients don't need to include bvclient.properties in order to define all default properties.

***
Release 1.1 - 26 July 2013
* 1.1 standalone JAR - [bvseosdk-1.1.jar](http://bazaarvoice.github.io/HostedUIResources/binaries/seosdk/java/1.1/bvseosdk-1.1.jar)
* 1.1 JAR with dependencies - [bvseosdk-1.1-jar-with-dependencies.jar](http://bazaarvoice.github.io/HostedUIResources/binaries/seosdk/java/1.1/bvseosdk-1.1-jar-with-dependencies.jar)
* **release notes**
 * SDK support for multiple configuration instances added
 * a default Configuration object is still built from the properties file defaults if defined
 * Note: the method signature for the static *getBVContent()* methods has now changed.  They require a Configuration object to be passed in.  

***
Release 1.0.1 - 26 June 2013
* 1.0.1 standalone JAR - [bvseosdk-1.0.1.jar](http://bazaarvoice.github.io/HostedUIResources/binaries/seosdk/java/1.0.1/bvseosdk-1.0.1.jar)
* 1.0.1 JAR with dependencies - [bvseosdk-1.0.1-jar-with-dependencies.jar](http://bazaarvoice.github.io/HostedUIResources/binaries/seosdk/java/1.0.1/bvseosdk-1.0.1-jar-with-dependencies.jar)
* **release notes**
 * Adds support for loading bvclient.properties from anywhere in the classpath
 * Any user agent string containing "Google" now includes the SEO content

***
Release 1.0
* 1.0 standalone JAR - [bvseosdk-1.0.jar](http://bazaarvoice.github.io/HostedUIResources/binaries/seosdk/java/1.0/bvseosdk-1.0.jar)
* 1.0 JAR with dependencies - [bvseosdk-1.0-jar-with-dependencies.jar](http://bazaarvoice.github.io/HostedUIResources/binaries/seosdk/java/1.0/bvseosdk-1.0-jar-with-dependencies.jar)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
